name: 吳冠毅
objective: In the second semester, this course first introduces the physical behavior in a simple mixture system and describes the chemical equilibrium by physical variables and state function. In addition to learning thermodynamics, we will also give the knowledge of chemical kinetics at the end of the semester.
schedule:
1. Course Introduction and Phase equilibrium in one component system (CH4)
2. Phase equilibrium in one component system (CH4)
3. Phase equilibrium in two-component system (CH4)
4. Thermodynamics of mixing (CH5)
5. The Thermodynamic of the ideal solution (CH5)
6. Mid-term Exam
7. The Thermodynamic of real solution (CH5)
8. Phase diagram (1/2) (CH5)
9. Phase diagram (2/2) (CH5)
10. Ionic solution (CH5)
11. Colligative Properties (CH5)
12. Midterm exam
13. Chemical transformation, Equilibrium constant (CH6) 
14. Electrochemical cell chemical cells (CH6)
15. Chemical kinetics (CH17)
16. Chemical kinetics (CH17)
17. Reaction dynamics (CH18)
18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 20 
Mid-term exam(I): 20
Mid-term exam(II):25
Final exam: 35
materials: Textbook: Physical Chemistry, International Edition, Peter Atkins (滄海書局)
